Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: METHODS : Marmosets were administered 1 - methyl - 4 - phenyl - 1 , 2 , 3 , 6 - tetrahydropyridine ( 2 . 0 mg / kg s . c . ) for five days , resulting in stable parkinsonism .

| Disease |
| --- |
| parkinsonism |

Explanation:

In the given paragraph, the only disease mentioned is "parkinsonism". It is a result of administering 1 - methyl - 4 - phenyl - 1, 2, 3, 6 - tetrahydropyridine to marmosets.
